title: Teams v2: Can't join meeting using the calendar/meeting button
body:
**Describe the bug**

When using Teams v2, I can not join meetings from the regular "Join" button (from the calendar view or from the meeting view)

It works from the in-app notification, but not from the regular button.

**To Reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Enable Teams v2
2. Go to the calendar
3. Click on "Join"

**Expected behavior**
The meeting is joined

**Desktop (please complete the following information):**
 - OS: Linux (Ubuntu)
 - .deb
 - Version 1.4.21

**Debug**
Opened the debug pane and this is shown in the console when clinking on the "Join" button:

    (index):3 Unhandled error/rejection {"isTrusted":true}
    error @ (index):3
    (anonymous) @ (index):3
